DOC.brief_summary: To assess efficacy safety salvage tratment Gemcitabine S-1 Combination metastatic colorectal cancer
DOC.brief_title: A Phase II Trial Salvage Treatment With Gemcitabine S-1 Combination Patients With Heavily Treated Advanced Colorectal Cancer .
DOC.criteria: non resectable colorectal adenocarcinoma . disease progression within 6months treatment irinotecan oxaliplatin contaning regimen . estimate life expectancy 3 month . ECOG status 2 low tumor type adenoarcinoma . presence history CNS metastasis . evidence gastrointestinal bleeding .
